string.base64: {{#label}} must be a valid base64 string
string.dataUri: {{#label}} must be a valid dataUri string
string.domain: {{#label}} must contain a valid domain name
string.empty: {{#label}} is not allowed to be empty
string.hexAlign: {{#label}} hex decoded representation must be byte-aligned
string.ip: {{#label}} must be a valid IP address with a {{#cidr}} CIDR
string.ipVersion: {{#label}} must be a valid IP address of one of the following versions {{#version}} with a {{#cidr}} CIDR
string.isoDuration: {{#label}} must be a valid ISO 8601 duration
string.max: {{#label}} length must be less than or equal to {{#limit}} characters long
string.min: {{#label}} length must be at least {{#limit}} characters long
string.normalize: {{#label}} must be Unicode normalized in the {{#form}} form
string.token: {{#label}} must only contain alpha-numeric and underscore characters
string.pattern.base: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} fails to match the required pattern: {{#regex}}
string.pattern.name: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} fails to match the {{#name}} pattern
string.pattern.invert.base: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} matches the inverted pattern: {{#regex}}
string.pattern.invert.name: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} matches the inverted {{#name}} pattern
string.trim: {{#label}} must not have leading or trailing whitespace
string.uriCustomScheme: {{#label}} must be a valid URI with a scheme matching the {{#scheme}} pattern
string.uriRelativeOnly: {{#label}} must be a valid relative URI
number.max: {{#label}} must be less than or equal to {{#limit}}
number.min: {{#label}} must be greater than or equal to {{#limit}}
date.greater: {{#label}} must be a date greater than {{#limit}}
date.less: {{#label}} must be a date less than {{#limit}}
date.max: {{#label}} must be a date less than or equal to {{#limit}}
date.min: {{#label}} must be a date greater than or equal to {{#limit}}
array.includes: {{#label}} must include at least one valid value
array.includesRequiredUnknowns: {{#label}} does not contain the required value for {{#unknownMisses}}
array.includesRequiredKnowns: {{#label}} does not contain the required value for {{#knownMisses}}
array.max: {{#label}} length must be less than or equal to {{#limit}}
object.max: {{#label}} must have less than or equal to {{#limit}} keys
binary.base: {{#label}} must be a buffer or a string
binary.max: {{#label}} must be less than or equal to {{#limit}} bytes
binary.ref: {{#label}} references "{{#ref}}" which is not a valid buffer or a string
